lines.text: Nobody cares for you anymore. You're tarnished and you're filthy.
I'm really sorry.
Oh no, it's alright.
[Last line]
No, I'm the real thing.
[smiles]
You bad girl... you have to follow the script!
Excuse me... who are you? Excuse me... who are you?
What? This isn't true! I didn't write this!
Of course you didn't. The real Mima is writing this.
Let's end all of this. We don't need two Mimas now, do we?
I am Mima!

[laughter]
That's funny. Mima is a pop idol... and you're just a dirty old imposter
You're the imposter! I'm not gonna take this anymore!
Please, Rumi! It is you, isn't it? Wake up!
You're the one who needs to wake up.
Are you all right? We're going back to Mima's room.
No... no! This is not my room!

[when they leave the Powertrons live show]
Not as well as on TV.
No, that's not the same.

[Talking to the audience after the incident]
The truth is that today more than ever, I wanted to have a good time with you.
These thing is told by the big stars, but not by you!...
[he tries to drop a can to Mima, but he's stopped by the guard ]
